Name: Fat bastard at the euros
StartPrompt: England are in the Euro 2024 finals! Some fat bastard 6 miles away has placed an order for 12 glazed donuts. WYD?
Options: Tell them to fuck off. Six miles is too far and my wife took the car in the divorce.
He needs that sweet sweet n u t otherwise how's he gonna celebrate when it comes home?
Conclusions: The guy calls you a racial slur and hangs up.
England brings it home and the fat bastard gains 2 stone from your donuts. The NHS is in crisis.
